Title: Tabi Machi Late Show
Description: ['Departures are moments that evoke both hope and melancholy. ', Tabi Machi Late Show, ' examines how these ambivalent emotions continue to persist long beyond that singular moment of parting. Azuma reminisces about her mentor as she sees off her own student; Kumeno recalls her short, turbulent friendship with Koizumi; Yukari meets an old friend during the Lantern Festival; and Sakurada fondly remembers the numerous students she has met during her teaching career.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Structured around a theme of goodbyes and journeys, ', Tabi Machi Late Show, ' is composed of four intimate, slice-of-life vignettes that wistfully examine the lasting impressions people leave on one another.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' [Written by MAL Rewrite]', ' ', ' ']
Voices: ['Gibu, Yuko', 'Taira, Masumi', 'Nakadai, Yoshikazu', 'Endou, Rina', 'Tomizawa, Yuuki', 'Ookuma, Kenta', 'Tabata, Miho', 'Morishita, Yukiko']
Staff: [['Hori, Yuuta', 'Producer'], ['Numata, Yuu', 'Director, Script, Storyboard, Creator'], ['Yamada, Haru', 'Sound Director'], ['Hoshiko, Senpuukyaku', 'Episode Director']]
